data.title: First name begins with “I”
data.meta_description: Details: Current age, faith/religion, birth name, links to movies with reviews
data.text:
I

Ian Holm …DIED age 88 (2020)—Parkinson’s disease

• Birth name: Ian Holm Cuthbert

• Wife: Sophie de Stempel

• Ex-Wives: Penelope Wilton (actress), Lynn Mary Shaw, Sophie Baker

Ian McKellen

• Faith: Atheism, known to tear apart the pages of Bibles; rejected the Gospel of Jesus Christ

• Worldview: Liberalism, Atheist activism, Homosexuality and LGBT support (activist)

• Birth name: Ian Murray McKellen

• Ex-Partners: Brian Taylor, Sean Mathias

Ian McShane

• Faith: apparently Secularism

• Birth name: Ian David McShane

• Wife: Gwen Humble

• Ex-Wives: Suzan Farmer (actress), Ruth Post (model)

• Ex-Partner: Sylvia Kristel (actress)

Ice Cube

• aka O'Shea Jackson Sr.

• Faith: Islam—When asked in 2017 if he was a practicing Muslim, he replied, “Yeah. But, you know, I’m gonna live a long life, and I might change religions three or four times before I die. I’m on Islam, but I’m Christianity [and] Buddhism. Everyone has something to offer to the world.” He has also said, “Religion is man-made, it’s flawed. I don’t follow nobody [but] my own conscience.”

• Worldview: Liberalism, Same-sex marriage supporter

• Birth name: O'Shea Jackson

• Wife: Kimberly Woodruff

Idina Menzel

• Faith: Unknown, of Jewish descent

• Worldview: Liberalism, Liberal Feminism, LGBT “Rights” (activist)

• Birth name: Idina Kim Mentzel

• Husband: Aaron Lohr

• Ex-Husband: Taye Diggs

Idris Elba

• Faith: “Spiritual but not religious,” primarily Secularism

• Birth name: Idrissa Akuna Elba

• Wife: Sabrina Dhowre

• Ex-Wives: Hanne Nørgaard and Sonya Nicole Hamlin

Ingrid Bergman …DIED age 67 (1982)—Breast cancer

• Faith: Jesus Christ—In Taiwan in 1970, she reportedly “prayed the prayer of repentance and received Jesus Christ as her Savior and Lord”.

• Daughter: Isabella Rossellini

• Ex-Husbands: Petter Aron Lindström, Roberto Rossellini (director), Lars Schmidt

• Ex-Partners: Gary Cooper, Gregory Peck (adultery), Anthony Quinn, Robert Capa (photographer, adultery), Larry Adler

Ioan Gruffudd

• Faith: Has said I “wouldn't describe myself as a deeply religious man”), ex-member of London Church of Christ, raised in Christianity

• Partner: Bianca Wallace

• Ex-Wife: Alice Evans (actress)

Isaac Hayes …DIED age 65—Stroke

• Faith: Scientology (activist); rejected the Gospel of Jesus Christ

• Birth name: Isaac Lee Hayes Jr.

• Wife: Adjowa Hayes

• Ex-Wives: Dancy Hayes, Emily Ruth Watson, and Mignon Harley

Isabella Rossellini

• Faith: reportedly Christianity (Roman Catholicism)

• Birth name: Isabella Fiorella Elettra Giovanna Rossellini

• Mother: Ingrid Bergman

• Father: Roberto Rossellini (director, screenwriter, producer)

• Half-Brother: Renzo Rossellini (producer)

• Ex-Husbands: Martin Scorsese and Jonathan Wiedemann

• Ex-Partner: David Lynch

• Ex-Partner and Ex-Fiancé: Gary Oldman

Isla Fisher

• Faith: Judaism convert (for her husband), raised in Christianity (Methodist)

• Birth name: Isla Lang Fisher

• Ex-Husband: Sacha Baron Cohen (resulting in 3 children)

Ivana Miličević

• Faith: Christianity (Roman Catholicism)

• Husband: Paddy Hogan
